entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of snow over southern sections early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
